['Mana steal no longer increases by 35% per jump.', "Now steals 11%/14%/17%/20% on the target's mana based on their maximum mana, instead of 20/35/50/65.", 'Now returns Medusa the actual amount of mana stolen, instead of always the full value.', '[U] No longer steal mana from illusions.', " Mystic Snake
Mana steal no longer increases by 35% per jump.
Now steals 11%/14%/17%/20% on the target's mana based on their maximum mana, instead of 20/35/50/65.
Now returns Medusa the actual amount of mana stolen, instead of always the full value.
[U] No longer steal mana from illusions."]
['Increased  Mystic Snake damage and mana steal increase per jump from 25% to 35%.']
